title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 November 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 01:40): XWiki.FADIERJeanMarie was modified by XWiki.FADIERJeanMarie - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/FADIERJeanMarie  
asyd - (28/11/2008 09:17): hello there  
asyd - (28/11/2008 09:17): is there a particular reason that is not possible to find some documents with a given class using the public api?  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:53): jvelociter: something is wrong  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:53): :)  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:53): platform takes about 8mn on my laptop to build  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:54): (with tests)  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:54): now if by trunks you mean really everything  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:54): then it sounds normal  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 11:54): functional tests take about 20-30 minutes alone  
jvelociter - (28/11/2008 12:00): no I mean platform  
jvelociter - (28/11/2008 12:01): that's the bad thing  :)  
jvelociter - (28/11/2008 12:02): what takes forever on my machine is assembling & expanding wars  
jvelociter - (28/11/2008 12:03): maybe I should reboot...  
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 12:33): Design.NewWysiwygEditorWikiExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvdrean - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorWikiExplorer  
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 12:46): XWiki.enygma was modified by XWiki.enygma (Created WatchList storage object) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/enygma  
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 14:17): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.RalucaMorosan - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:03): mflorea, lucaa: how is it going with the wysiwyg implementation?  
lucaa - (28/11/2008 16:04): vmassol: working on the image plugin, will commit a first minimally working version after I review the last details / add documentation  
lucaa - (28/11/2008 16:04): vmassol: will allow to add images from the current page's attachments as well as uploading new files to the current page.  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:05): ok, so starting tomorrow we'll be able to test drive it?  
mflorea - (28/11/2008 16:05): vmassol: I'm working for XWIKI-2897, XWIKI-2889 and XWIKI-2737. For the last, I've implemented a custom command  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:06): (I need to fix the IRC bot so that it displays the JIRA issue titles)  
mflorea - (28/11/2008 16:06): that would be nice :)  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:06): mflorea: they are the remaining bugs I guess  
mflorea - (28/11/2008 16:06): no  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:07): mflorea: what about the macro  support for viewing?  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:07): (what about = when do you think it'll be ready)  
lucaa - (28/11/2008 16:08): vmassol: yes, and I will continue implementation over the we, to be able to add sizes parameters and to use the selected text as image alt/title.  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 16:09): ok  
mflorea - (28/11/2008 16:09): vmsssol: haven't started to work on macros. I hope for next week  
jvdrean - (28/11/2008 17:12): asyd : you were right, there's a problem with groovy + attached jar  
asyd - (28/11/2008 17:12): ahhhh !  
asyd - (28/11/2008 17:13): you own me a beer ;p  
jvdrean - (28/11/2008 17:14): ;)  
jvbot - (28/11/2008 18:01): Main.WebHome was modified - http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/  
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 18:46): Features.RightsManagement was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (You'll need to have admin rights if you want to modify user rights > You'll need to have the admin right granted in order to modify permissions for other users and groups) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/RightsManagement  
xwikibot - (28/11/2008 18:47): Features.RightsManagement was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/RightsManagement

jvbot - (28/11/2008 19:12): XWiki.Notification was modified - http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notification  
vmassol - (28/11/2008 19:14): hehe we have lots of bots now :)
